author: Reuters Editorial
title: Crescita Therapeutics™ Reports Qtrly Net Loss From Continuing Operations Per Share $0.03
text:
May 9, 2018 / 11:46 AM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-Crescita Therapeutics™ Reports Qtrly Net Loss From Continuing Operations Per Share $0.03 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Crescita Therapeutics Inc:
* CRESCITA THERAPEUTICS™ REPORTS 2018 FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
* CRESCITA THERAPEUTICS INC QTRLY NET LOSS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS PER SHARE $0.03 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
